fr.ups.interactions.model

Class InteractionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.ups.interactions.model.InteractionManager

  • public class InteractionManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The InteractionManager class manages all interactions.

        public void onResumeInteractions(android.hardware.SensorManager sensorManager,
